Formula-building lemma for use with the Distinctor Reduction Theorem. Part of Theorem 9.4 of [Megill] p. 448 (p. 16 of preprint). (Contributed by NM, 27-Feb-2005.)

 Formula-building lemma for use with the Distinctor Reduction Theorem. Part of Theorem 9.4 of [Megill] p. 448 (p. 16 of preprint). (Contributed by NM, 27-Feb-2005.)  (Revised by NM, 3-Feb-2015.)
statement:
dral1.1 $e |- ( A. x x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
drex1 $p |- ( A. x x = y -> ( E. x ph <-> E. y ps ) ) $.
